author: Rocco Fazzari
title: I'll be watching you, Malcolm
text:

I'll be watching you, Malcolm
The racial discrimination act debate

I'll be watching you, Malcolm Every move Turnbull makes, Abbott is watching. Denis Carnahan and Rocco Fazzari, with apologies to The Police.
PT1M13S 620 349 Autoplay On Off Video feedback Video settings A new parliamentary session, a new prime minister, a new sitting arrangement, and a new attitude.
So far so good for new Prime Minister Malcolm Turnbull as he soaks up the love in his honeymoon period.
However one particular set of eyes will be watching his every move. Tony Abbott's.
While the former prime minister did state that there would be no undermining there has been some evidence of white anting.
In the rough and tumble world of politics this is to be expected.
Advertisement This week we launch into a new series of videos. Resident music maestro Denis Carnahan derives his inspiration from The Police as we sync music and animated sequences for this week's political parody.
